coauthors.description: a command separated list of coauthors of the book

url.description: The URL of a webpage that provides more information about the book

description.description: A one or two paragraph description of the book

pages.description: The number of pages in the book

year_first_published.description: The year the book was first published

cover.description: The path to the cover image of the book

keywords.description: A comma separated list of 5 to 20 keywords that reference a wide variety of topics related to this book like theme, genre, setting, characters, and other keywords that could be used to link to books with similar keywords

date_read.description: The date the book was read
